member.name: M:LAIR.ResourceAPIs.PostGIS.Geometry.GetPoints(Npgsql.NpgsqlConnection,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String},System.Double)
member.param: Column containing a unique ID for each geometry
Additional column constraints for rows to process
Filter threshold (in units corresponding to the geometry's SRID). Two consecutive points this far apart or nearer will be combined.
member.returns: List of List of PointF structures
